sys_openapi_operation.name: Gets the specified roads with the status aggregated over the date range specified, or now until the end of today if no dates are passed.

openapi.display_value: Transport for London Unified API - v1

sys_openapi_operation.sys_name: Gets the specified roads with the status aggregated over the date range specified, or now until the end of today if no dates are passed.
